name: DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY, as Indenture Trustee for American Home Mortgage Investment Trust 2007-2, Mortgage Backed Notes, Series 2007-2, Petitioner v. Larry TURK a/k/a Larry I. Turk and Patricia Turk a/k/a Patricia E. Turk, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Deutsche Bank National Trust Co. v. Turk

parties: DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY, as Indenture Trustee for American Home Mortgage Investment Trust 2007-2, Mortgage Backed Notes, Series 2007-2, Petitioner v. Larry TURK a/k/a Larry I. Turk and Patricia Turk a/k/a Patricia E. Turk, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of January, 2013, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The order of the Superi- or Court is VACATED, and this matter is REMANDED for reconsideration in light of Newman Development Group of Pottstown, LLC v. Genuardi’s Family Markets, Inc., 2012 WL 4473281 (decided 9/28/2012).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
61 A.3d 186
DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY, as Indenture Trustee for American Home Mortgage Investment Trust 2007-2, Mortgage Backed Notes, Series 2007-2, Petitioner v. Larry TURK a/k/a Larry I. Turk and Patricia Turk a/k/a Patricia E. Turk, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 7, 2013.
